mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS(user_id, store_id, order_price, status, delivery_address, history) VALUES (#{userId}, #{order.storeId}, #{order.orderPrice}, #{order.status}, #{order.deliveryAddress}, #{order.history , typeHandler = com.flab.delivery.mapper.handler.JsonTypeHandler})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_price, o.status, o.store_id, o.created_at, o.history, o.delivery_address, p.type FROM ORDERS o JOIN PAY p ON o.id = #{orderId} AND p.orders_id = o.id

SELECT o.status, o.created_at, o.delivery_address, u.phone_number, s.name, o.history FROM ORDERS o JOIN STORE s ON s.id = #{storeId} AND s.id = o.store_id JOIN USER u ON u.id = o.user_id ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT 100;

SELECT o.id, o.status, s.address_id, s.name, s.detail_address, o.delivery_address, u.phone_number FROM ORDERS o JOIN STORE s ON o.id = #{orderId} AND s.id = #{storeId} AND s.user_id = #{ownerId} AND o.status = 'ORDER_APPROVED' AND s.id = o.store_id JOIN USER u ON u.id = o.user_id

SELECT o.id, o.status, s.address_id, s.name, s.detail_address, o.delivery_address, u.phone_number, o.start_time FROM ORDERS o JOIN STORE s ON o.rider_id = #{riderId} AND o.status = 'IN_DELIVERY' AND s.id = o.store_id JOIN USER u ON u.id = o.user_id ORDER BY o.start_time DESC
